name: Disperlat® SCF
description: Disperlat® SCF is composed of tristyrylphenyl ether phosphate tea salt. It serves as a highly effective wetting agent, specifically designed for suspension concentrate (SC) formulations. This product functions excellently as both a dispersing and wetting agent. Its superior suspension properties contribute significantly to the overall quality of the product. Disperlat® SCF typically appears as a dark yellow to light amber viscous liquid.
